timeout.description: Number of seconds trivago should stop sending requests (for use with Error Code 4).

message.description: String describing the error (maximum length of 1000 characters).

hotel_ids.description: Array of hotels ids for which this error occurs.

error_code.description:
One of the error codes described below :
1. Unknown Error
2. Request cannot be parsed
3. Invalid Hotel ID (Should be returned if partner_reference is unknown).
4. Timeout requested (stops requests for the specified time).
5. Recoverable Error (equivalent to http 503).
